item.title: Smartphone maker Nothing to spin off its affordable CMF brand
item.description: Nothing is making its affordable devices brand CMF into a separate entity with headquarters in India.

item.title: India court rejects X’s ‘free speech’ argument, backs government takedown powers
item.description: X sued the Indian government in March over content takedown orders issued through its centralized portal.
